page.title: 04Rangemore School Activities
page.content: When we play games we can use the village playing field which is opposite the school. We play{netball, {football, rounders}and{cricket.}We have matches against nine other schools in the{Dove Valley League.}We particularly enjoy{Summer Sports Day} held each year in July. We do not have our own swimming pool but the Junior children walk to the pool at{Needwood School.}This walk takes about 15 minutes. We also take part in the{Burton Junior Schools {Swimming Gala and Gymnastic {Competition.} On a Tuesday evening the Junior children have a{Club}from 6.00 until 7.30 p.m. Parents help to run the club and we can use a computer, knit, sew, play table tennis and other games. We go on visits and have a tuck shop.
